mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MEMBER VALUES( SEQ_MEMBER_NO.NEXTVAL, #{id}, #{pwd}, #{nickname}, #{name}, #{address}, #{phone}, #{email}, DEFAULT, DEFAULT, DEFAULT, DEFAULT, DEFAULT )
mapper.update: UPDATE MEMBER SET NICKNAME = #{nickname} , PWD = #{pwd} , ADDRESS = #{address} , PHONE = #{phone}, NAME = #{name}, EMAIL = #{email}, MODIFY_DATE = SYSDATE WHERE ID = #{id} AND STATUS = 'Y'
mapper.select: SELECT ID FROM MEMBER WHERE EMAIL = #{email} AND STATUS = 'Y'

SELECT M.MEMBER_NO AS MEMBER_NO, NICKNAME, EMAIL, PROFILE_NO, CHANGE_NAME, PROFILE_PATH FROM MEMBER "M" LEFT JOIN PROFILE_IMG "PI" ON (M.MEMBER_NO = PI.MEMBER_NO) WHERE M.MEMBER_NO = #{boardWriter}

SELECT BOARD_NO, PRODUCT_NAME, PRICE, CONTENT, TRADE_CATEGORY_NO, B.CREATE_DATE AS CREATE_DATE, BOARD_IMG_NO, IMG_PATH, CHANGE_NAME FROM BOARD B LEFT JOIN BOARD_IMG USING (BOARD_NO) WHERE BOARD_WRITER = #{memberNo} AND B.STATUS='Y' AND SALE_CONDITION = 'Y'

SELECT BOARD_NO, PRODUCT_NAME, PRICE, CONTENT, TRADE_CATEGORY_NO, B.CREATE_DATE AS CREATE_DATE, BOARD_IMG_NO, IMG_PATH, CHANGE_NAME FROM BOARD B LEFT JOIN BOARD_IMG USING (BOARD_NO) WHERE BOARD_WRITER = #{memberNo} AND B.STATUS='Y' AND SALE_CONDITION = 'Y'

SELECT F.MEMBER_NO AS "MEMBER_NO", B.BOARD_NO AS "BOARD_NO",
PRODUCT_NAME, PRICE,
CHANGE_NAME, IMG_PATH,
B.CREATE_DATE AS "CREATE_DATE"
FROM FAVORITE_LIST F LEFT JOIN BOARD B ON F.BOARD_NO = B.BOARD_NO LEFT JOIN BOARD_IMG BI ON B.BOARD_NO = BI.BOARD_NO WHERE F.MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo}
